医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Carcinotech 发表了关于患者来源的 3D 打印肿瘤的研究，作为药物开发的突破性工具组织工程和 3D 生物打印的进步彻底改变了生理相关 3D 体外癌症模型的开发，提供了肿瘤微环境 (TME) 的更接近的表征并实现了高通量药物筛选。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-publishes-research-on-病人-衍生-3D-printed-tumors-as-a-breakthrough-tool-for-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Carcinotech-publishes-research-on-病人-衍生-3D-printed-tumors-as-a-breakthrough-tool-for-drug-development.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92684502-94af-4467-972e-47b674a68766 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 05:02:00 -0400 Carcinotech publishes research on patient-derived 3D-printed tumors as a breakthrough tool for drug development
第一代抗组胺药可能会增加幼儿癫痫发作的风险研究表明，第一代抗组胺药可能会增加幼儿癫痫发作的风险，这凸显了谨慎处方的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/First- Generation-antihistamine-drugs-could-increase-seizure-risk-among-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/First- Generation-antihistamine-drugs-could-increase-seizure-risk-among-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67d7f863-19d5-4d33-91fd-5e2fcc0e2ccb Fri, 30 Aug 2024 05:00:00 -0400 First-generation antihistamine drugs could increase seizure risk among young children

AmelHap：蜜蜂单倍型图谱Beebytes 很高兴与罗斯林研究所、西班牙巴斯克地区大学以及国家农业、食品和环境研究所合作，完成了第一份出版物，即蜜蜂“单体型图”的开发（INRAE）在法国。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/AmelHap-A-honeybee-haplotype-map.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/AmelHap-A-honeybee-haplotype-map.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b97f583f-da1c-41c0-8b26-db7dd75ea4df Fri, 30 Aug 2024 03:23:00 -0400 AmelHap: A honeybee haplotype map
北冰洋被揭示为新药物的潜在宝库研究人员从北极海洋放线菌中发现了新的抗毒和抗菌化合物，为对抗抗生素耐药性大肠杆菌感染提供了潜在的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/The-Arctic-Sea-revealed-as-a-潜在-treasure-trove-for-new-medicines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/The-Arctic-Sea-revealed-as-a-潜在-treasure-trove-for-new-medicines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5505013-1923-446e-8ed8-34d9611ffef4 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 01:02:00 -0400 The Arctic Sea revealed as a potential treasure trove for new medicines
肥胖会使 SARS-CoV-2 感染的风险增加 34%肥胖与暴露后​​感染 SARS-CoV-2 的风险增加 34% 相关，这凸显了体重管理在预防 COVID-19 中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Obesity-increases-the-risk-of-SARS-CoV-2-infection-by-3425.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Obesity-increases-the-risk-of-SARS-CoV-2-infection-by-3425.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fc8b96c-5343-491d-a6b6-a03f2d20e043 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 00:03:00 -0400 Obesity increases the risk of SARS-CoV-2 infection by 34%
Mpox在英国持续存在：疫苗效力强，保持警惕研究发现，2023 年英格兰的 MPOX 病例仍然较低但稳定，MVA-BN 疫苗在预防严重疾病方面显示出 82% 的有效性，特别是在 GBMSM 中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Mpox-persists-in-England-Strong-vaccine- effectiveness-stay-vigilant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240829/Mpox-persists-in-England-Strong-vaccine- effectiveness-stay-vigilant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5239fc44-bcff-4545-8235-eca0d489e594 Thu, 29 Aug 2024 23:29:00 -0400 Mpox persists in England: Strong vaccine effectiveness, stay vigilant
